project_title: Assessing Customer Churn Using Machine Learning
project_description: Built a predictive model to identify customers at risk of churning using classification algorithms and feature engineering techniques.
Developed a machine learning classifier to predict credit card approval decisions with 87% accuracy using scikit-learn and logistic regression.
Applied statistical hypothesis testing to healthcare data to validate treatment effectiveness and patient outcome improvements.
Created a regression model to predict movie rental durations based on customer behavior and film characteristics.
Used unsupervised learning to cluster Antarctic penguin species based on physical measurements and habitat data.
